title: Why is Darius getting tremendous buffs in 5.17? Also Gragas nerfs wtf??
body:
He's really damn strong. His damage is insane and his lack of sustain weakness is gone due to the q strong heal. He's getting buffed hard.
Darius
General
Attack speed by level increased to 2% instead of 1%
Decimate (Q)
Damages increased to 40/70/100/130/160 from 20/40/60/80/100
Heal for each champion hit by his axe increasedd to 15% from 10% of missing health
Crippling Strike (W)
Gives back 100% of its mana cost and half its CS if a target is killed with this spell



Also more Gragas nerfs when the devourer champs are fucking op along with vayne, diana, heimer, malzahar. I have mained Gragas for 2 years and I have always been fine with the nerfs until now. He didn't need more nerfs, especially such a strong nerf.
Drunken Rage (W)
Max health bonus damages reduced to 8% from 8/9/10/11/12%

What do I max next on Gragas now? I guess still w cause of cd and flat dmg increase but really.. he didn't need that.

First of all. It was a good choise that darius get those buffs. 
His Q is now much harder to hit and if u do not hit exatly with the axe than u do not get a heal (so you do not get  a heal all the time -> u must hit the enemie champion with the axe). 
If he uses his Q he can not do something else. And u see the Q if he wanted to use it. So if u see that darius wanted to use Q why do u not only dodge it? 
U only need to get close to him or out of his range. His axe is the important factor. 
And darius now need to get his passive to defeat an enemie. (so he do fokus on hitting the enemie with normal attacks (for the 5 stacks))

So do try darius out if u think he is so op. Most people say things without knowing something about the champ. and that is a bit sad.
And darius can be counter now much easier atm.

LOL! Darius lv 9 had 300 base damage with his Q, which few AD champions can tell the same. His AD ratios were insane, and his ult was insane too (true damage) and his passive too. Now he has less BASE damage on Q but it seems he has more than a 100% AD ratio on Q, his passive still deals good damage (physical, which deal true damage cumulated with his armor penetration) AND boosts INSANELY his AD that is basically high for a tanky toplaner, his Q regenerates him for 15% to 30% of his own missing health, that increases fast because he's naturally tanky and his builds are too. He has 2 slows where he had only 1 before, so u can never escape him. if his W kills u, it refunds the entire mana cost, AND it has 50% of the cooldown reducted. His grab didn't really change. is ult has no mana cost at all lv 3 and he can use it again and again and again and again and again and again etc. just by finishing his targets with it (sure he won't engage a full hp guy with his ult...) so he was strong but now he is unbeatable on the top lane, except by some genius who can bait him all the time, avoid the grab all the time, control him all the time, and probably kill him before he gets into the range for his Q and E. Good luck, I think that except Diamond, few people can do it.
yeah, need to actually have brain now to beat him, but since thats not a given for league players, hes considered "op" now.

What buffs? hes Q still on a shitty delay, the dmgs now dont nearly reflect the q on patch 5.15. Hes E still doesnt hook at the distance is supposed too and i dont mean the bug where he catches you anyway even if you escape the area. Darius is a lot weaker he is now then 5.15. The ony thing stronger is his passive which means you have to KS a kill with your dunk to activate it because stacking is well LMAO harder then before.

PS- his heal on Q doesnt mean shit cause you can EASILY deny it by well...... simply walk up to him. Simply put if your range walk out of it or if your melee you can just walk into it.
